Package org.eclipse.actf.ui.util.timer

This package contains timer utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SyncEventListener
    SyncEventListener interface extends Runnable interface.
    WaitExecSyncEventHandler
    The interface for implementing an event handler that periodically check if action can be executed right now.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WaitExecSyncEventListener
    Utility to periodically check if action defined in WaitExecSyncEventHandler can be executed.
    WeakSyncTimer
    WeakSyncTimer is a timer running on a thread.
    Yield
    Utility class for thread execution related to Display.

Package org.eclipse.actf.ui.util.timer Description

This package contains timer utilities.
